::Spears::

She held out her hand, "I'm Spears. Pleased to meet you.  And yes I 
knew that we had them outnumbered.  If they did anything, the group 
could have killed them.  My loss would have made it worth it 
especially if he survived. And he did."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus raises an eyebrow. "Every Maximal is equally important. But 
they 
> would probably have taken you and killed him anyways. They arn't 
fair bot, 
> the only reason they let Ramhorn go was because they were 
outnumbered."
> 
> Ramulus looks Spears over, "I'm Ramulus, what's your name?"
